description: Try our easy to follow Honey Mustard Chicken recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Honey Mustard Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 Masterfoods Honey Mustard Chicken recipe base

recipeInstructions.text: Spray pan with canola oil and heat, add chicken and cook until brown. Set aside.
Add MasterFoodsÂ® Honey Mustard Chicken recipe base and light cream then stir through.
Add green beans and carrots, then simmer uncovered for 10 minutes, or until vegetables are soft. Once soft, add the chicken and stir to combine.
Serve with rice (cooked as per instruction on pack).
